entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Showers beginning near midnight and ending before morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the evening. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
